title: Toyblocks: A toy blockchain implementation in Python
author: daneah
content: readme.md toyblocksgetting started>>> import block>>> my_block = block.block(' data')>>> my_blockblock<hash: 4ce505..., nonce: none>>>> my_block.mine()>>> my_blockblock<hash: 00006a..., nonce: 3763>import blockimport blockchainchain = blockchain.blockchain() = block.block('')second = block.block('second')third = block.block('third')chain.add_block()chain.add_block(second)chain.add_block(third).update_data(' broke')print(chain.broken) # truechain.repair()print(chain.broken) # falsecreditsimplementation based behavior observed anders brownworth'sblockchain demo
